last_episode_to_air.name: The Colonel
last_episode_to_air.overview: A vulnerable Sirohi risks succumbing to the colonel’s deadly commands. The survivors head to Betaal Mountain for an ultimate fight against the curse.

name: Betaal
overview: A remote village becomes the arena of a breathless battle when an undead East India Company officer and his battalion of zombie redcoats attack a squad of modern-day soldiers.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: A remote village becomes the arena of a breathless battle when an undead East India Company officer and his battalion of zombie redcoats attack a squad of modern-day soldiers

episodes.name: The Tunnel
episodes.overview: While displacing villagers to reopen a tunnel through a supposedly cursed mountain, officials face tribal resistance and an otherworldly attack.

episodes.name: The Barracks
episodes.overview: The group secures the barracks, but as strange deaths and disappearances continue, Sirohi presses Puniya for the truth about the casualties among them.

episodes.name: The Battle
episodes.overview: A squad member is found to be possessed by the evil colonel’s spirit. As the threats inside the now-defenseless barracks grow, the zombie army approaches.

episodes.name: The Colonel
episodes.overview: A vulnerable Sirohi risks succumbing to the colonel’s deadly commands. The survivors head to Betaal Mountain for an ultimate fight against the curse.
